017package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
024
025/**
026 * Request attribute variable resolver.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * The format for this var is <js>"$R{key1[,key2...]}"</js>.
030 * <br>When multiple keys are used, returns the first non-null/empty value.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * The possible values are:
034 * <ul>
035 *    <li><js>"authorityPath"</js> - Value returned by {@link RestRequest#getAuthorityPath()}
036 *    <li><js>"contextPath"</js> - Value returned by {@link RestRequest#getContextPath()}
037 *    <li><js>"method"</js> - Value returned by {@link RestRequest#getMethod()}
038 *    <li><js>"pathInfo"</js> - Value returned by {@link RestRequest#getPathInfo()}
039 *    <li><js>"requestParentURI"</js> - Value returned by {@link UriContext#getRootRelativePathInfoParent()}
040 *    <li><js>"requestURI"</js> - Value returned by {@link RestRequest#getRequestURI()}
041 *    <li><js>"servletParentURI"</js> - Value returned by {@link UriContext#getRootRelativeServletPathParent()}
042 *    <li><js>"servletPath"</js> - See {@link RestRequest#getServletPath()}
043 *    <li><js>"servletURI"</js> - See {@link UriContext#getRootRelativeServletPath()}
044 * </ul>
045 *
046 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
047 * <p class='bjava'>
048 *    String <jv>servletClass</jv> = <jv>restRequest</jv>.getVarResolver().resolve(<js>"$R{servletClass}"</js>);
049 * </p>
050 *
051 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
052 *    <li class='note'>
053 *       This variable resolver requires that a {@link RestRequest} bean be available in the session bean store.
054 *    <li class='note'>
055 *       For security reasons, nested and recursive variables are not resolved.
056 * </ul>
057 *
058 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
059 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestServerSvlVariables">SVL Variables</a>
060 * </ul>
061 */
062public class RequestVar extends MultipartResolvingVar {
063
064   /** The name of this variable. */
065   public static final String NAME = "R";
066
067   /**
068    * Constructor.
069    */
070   public RequestVar() {
071      super(NAME);
072   }
073
074   @Override /* Var */
075   protected boolean allowNested() {
076      return false;
077   }
078
079   @Override /* Var */
080   protected boolean allowRecurse() {
081      return false;
082   }
083
084   @Override /* Var */
085   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) {
086      RestRequest req = session.getBean(RestRequest.class).orElseThrow(InternalServerError::new);
087      char c = StringUtils.charAt(key, 0);
088      if (c == 'a') {
089         if ("authorityPath".equals(key))
090            return req.getAuthorityPath();
091      } else if (c == 'c') {
092         if ("contextPath".equals(key))
093            return req.getContextPath();
094      } else if (c == 'm') {
095         if ("method".equals(key))
096            return req.getMethod();
097      } else if (c == 'p') {
098         if ("pathInfo".equals(key))
099            return req.getPathInfo();
100      } else if (c == 'r') {
101         if ("requestParentURI".equals(key))
102            return req.getUriContext().getRootRelativePathInfoParent();
103         if ("requestURI".equals(key))
104            return req.getRequestURI();
105      } else if (c == 's') {
106         if ("servletClass".equals(key))
107            return req.getContext().getResourceClass().getName();
108         if ("servletClassSimple".equals(key))
109            return req.getContext().getResourceClass().getSimpleName();
110         if ("servletParentURI".equals(key))
111            return req.getUriContext().getRootRelativeServletPathParent();
112         if ("servletPath".equals(key))
113            return req.getServletPath();
114         if ("servletURI".equals(key))
115            return req.getUriContext().getRootRelativeServletPath();
116      }
117      return req.getAttributes().get(key).asString().orElse(null);
118   }
119
120   @Override /* Var */
121   public boolean canResolve(VarResolverSession session) {
122      return session.getBean(RestRequest.class).isPresent();
123   }
124}
